rules.description: ⇪ + ⌘ + ⇧ + {u/o} -> Select text to beginning/end of document (Studbolt)
⇪ + ⌘ + u/o -> Move cursor to beginning/end of document (Studbolt)
⇪ + ⌘ + i/k -> Move cursor up/down one line (Studbolt)
⇪ + ⌘ + j/l -> Jump to beginning/end of line (Studbolt)
⇪ + ⌘ + ⇧ + j/l -> Select text to beginning/end of line (Studbolt)
⇪ + [⇧] + y/h -> Page up/down with optional text highlighting (studbolt)
